name: Skyblivion
description:
Skyblivion is the ultimate fan-made experience for the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion, bringing the game into the newer engine of the Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. This process combines Oblivion’s impressive award-winning open-world that is renowned for its incredible gameplay, memorable quests, and expansive world space with the advancements in gaming that have been made in the last two decades. Set in the Elder Scroll’s Third Era, during the cataclysmic Oblivion Crisis, you must help to restore the Imperial throne and repel the demonic Daedric invasion.

Skyblivion will feature the remastered entirety of Oblivion’s mainland, Cyrodiil, from the wintery slopes of the Valus and Jerall Mountains to the swamps of Blackwood and warm-beachy shores of the Gold Coast. Skyblivion will bring the return of many classic Oblivion mechanics like spell crafting, a complete class and attributes system, underwater combat, and NPC disposition.

In addition to recreating Oblivion’s systems and porting them into the Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim’s engine the project has taken great care in providing new improvements and additions. Skyblivion offers fans remastered graphics, weather, and lighting, an expanded soundtrack, new gameplay mechanics, and even a limited selection of bespoke minor quests with original voice acting to further flesh out barren areas of Oblivion—all for free!

Once Skyblivion is released in 2025, fans will have access to the entirety of Oblivion’s pre-DLC world space, systems, and quests available for play. But that’s not the end of the project! Following a period of bug-fixing and community-supported updates the project development team will move on to working on Oblivion’s nine additional content releases plus the Shivering Isles expansion.

With Skyblivion you experience the best of both worlds: The complex and detailed RPG experience of Oblivion paired with Skyrim’s newer systems, graphics, and quality of life improvements. Will you close shut the jaws of Oblivion once more in 2025?

name: Chi
description:
Chi is a horror game that (poorly) facades as a cute story in which you play as a six year old girl who lives in a small village in Japan with her family and her small dog. Your father is the priest of the small shrine you live in, and you have to follow several important rules that he has set up to keep the village safe. These are the rules: you know what is best for the villagers, so they have to do whatever you and your family say, you cannot go upstairs, you must give blood every Sunday, and you cannot go into the forest.

This specific Sunday, you play as Chi as she goes on a quest with her puppy, Mitsuru, to get markers so that she can draw some pictures. You complete some minor favors, and get your blood drawn so you're able to get said markers. However, as you're walking home, the evening goes terribly wrong as Mitsuru runs into the forest. With this, in order to save your dog, you have no choice but to run in after her...

Run after her into a forest that no one returns from.

name: CaseCracker2
description: Jia huasheng ,the policeman of Chicheng police station, got disappeared without any trace after leaving a letter which illustrates the police station to start the CaseCracker system version 2.0.

name: Crime Simulator
description: Crime Simulator is a co-op game you can become a criminal. Start as a lowlife and slowly work your way up by completing jobs, stealing and more. Take over enemy hideouts, build your own weed farm. Do everything with friends, or alone. Go in guns blazing or be quiet and stealthy. It's all up to you.

name: Deck Defense
description: Deck Defense is a deck building tower defense game, where the player controls both their defenses and the expansion of the map. Expand your deck after each wave with one of over 65 cards to choose from, and try to keep the enemy blobs from reaching the portal.

name: Wakusei
description:
Wakusei is a relaxing physics puzzle game about dropping and merging planets.

Drop planets around an eclipse to merge same planets into new ones. This might cause the extinction of some civilisations but it's okay, we asked them first.

The 360° gameplay makes for an interesting new experience and new strategies.

Unlock upgrades, new events and additional game modes.

Put the universe into a jar in Classic Mode or experience how the game must've felt like before gravity got invented in the Anti Gravity Mode.

name: Reader Rabbit Kindergarten
description: Reader Rabbit and Mat the Mouse collect resources for a large campfire party at Camp Happy Tales.

name: Activision Anthology
description: A bundle with 5 games released for the Digiblast.

name: Collective Unconscious
description:
Collective Unconscious is a collaborative, multiplayer game that draws inspiration from Yume Nikki and its fangames. You control Minnatsuki, a mysterious character wandering around a dream-like world full of spirits and otherworldly beings.

The game is exclusively made for an online multiplayer experience, and hosted under the Yume Nikki Online Project server.

Discover new worlds, gather collectibles, and share a unique experience with your friends across the spirit world!

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Thrown to the Dogs
description: Thrown to the Dogs is a downloadable content pre-order expansion package for Assassin's Creed: Shadows that is expected to release alongside the main game. It will involve helping a loyal dog avenge his late master.

name: He Sneaks
description: Your car has broken down, seek help in a small old house! But you are not alone there, save yourself from the evil demon ...

name: Warlords 2: Rise of Demons
description:
Warlords 2: Rise of Demons is a strategy game developed by Ben Olding games, and is a sequel to "Warlords: Call to Arms".

Pick from a variety of different races, from Humans, Elves, Trolls and the Undead, and even the demons themselves, to conquer the land of Beneril.

name: King of Producer
description: King of Producer is a simulation strategy game in which the player takes the role of an employee that the president of a gaming company tells him to create a new game, so he will have to choose game creators and the style of the game, and he also can buy the furnitures, and other things in the building to make his employees feel better.

name: Codemount
description: Automount showed us that skimping on development costs was the way to go, so we decided to go even further!

name: GigaBash: Godzilla - Nemesis DLC
description:
The Nemeses of Godzilla have invaded!
This DLC adds King Ghidorah and Hedorah from the Godzilla universe to the playable roster. Each character features a unique skillset and playstyle inspired by iconic moments seen in their respective films.

name: Stop Thief
description: This game was inspired by the arcade game Narc, just shooting a bunch of bad guys on the street and occasionally using a rocket launcher to clear out enemies. But then there's the hang glider stage!

name: Sir Erik
description: Guide the Knight with the Nose through a series of dungeons filled with monsters and robots alike! Destroy everything that moves!

name: Orb of Millean
description: Straight up fantasy side scroller slash-em-up! Save the world of Millean by defeating the invading monsters and restoring the Orb!

name: Maniac Outhouse
description:
The Challenge... set an adventure in a house that's the exact opposite of a multi-room mansion.

In this (barely) Point & Click adventure you have one goal ...It is a very short "game"!

name: Jump Jeroba
description: Jumo Jeroba is a minimalist 2D platforming game but this time, you are controlling a Jeroba. You will need to time your jumps correctly to succed since you don't control Jeroba's movement.

name: Cosmic Ark
description: An unofficial remake the Atari 2600 game. Survive the bombardment of asteroids and rescue alien critters from the planet's surface.

name: Playback Loop
description: Carefully capture tracks of your actions, then play them back to solve puzzles with the aid of your recorded ghosts. Immerse yourself in an intriguing first-person puzzle platformer game set within an enigmatic virtual facility, where strategically thinking several steps ahead is the key to success.

name: Captain Blind
description: This one stars'Captain Blind' as he beat up plant things and other random enemies.

name: Silly Tower
description: SillyTower is a physics based game where you must build the highest possible tower!

name: Archer
description: You play as a guy with a bow and arrow - an archer, if you will - who must search the ... mines maybe... in search of bombs to diffuse.

name: Winter Sports
description: Sin descripción

name: Archer 2
description: Heavily inspired by Die Hard, Archer 2 takes place in a multi story office building overrun with terrorists! This time there are no bombs to diffuse, but there are a few to set off, and lots of hidden hamburgers to find to restore your health!

name: Earl the Tomb Robber
description: Take Earl the Tomb Robber on an adventure in search of treasure!

name: Enter Passcode
description:
I've forgotten my 4 digit passcode!

Fortunately, I saved some hints on my phone. All the hints have a yes/no answer. I remember that if you know all the answers then you can determine the passcode, and that there are no redundant questions.

name: Loftlock
description:
Loftlock is a point-and-click fantasy puzzle game. You are Runi: a young wizard who is eager to set off for their new apprenticeship. Your beloved grandmother has bequeathed a tome to you that will undoubtedly serve you well in the coming days, but there’s a catch – she’s forgotten the combination to its lock!

Thankfully, she’s left some clues in the attic – all you need to do is find them.

name: Little Shops of Murder
description: There was a murder in a small town. The police ask you and your team for help.

name: Dead Cards
description:
WELCOME IN DEAD CARDS !

Each game, a card is killed in a deck a card. The killer is always the card that was on top of the victim in the card game. Find the truth by questioning each card, which will give you clues as to their position in the deck. Only one card lie, it's the murderer! Investigate and find to incoherence to put it in jail.

name: A Trench Tale
description:
A misterious dead man. A castle where dark rituals are performed. A cosmic horror that is corrupting the world as it is. Even the Spanish Inquisition is involved. Would you be able to defeat the evil?

A Trench Tale is a narrative card game where you have to combine two cards at a time to generate new cards that represent steps in your investigation. You will have to relationate concepts to undercover the mistery.

name: New HR Job
description: You're a new employee at a remote only job. You must find out which handles match which employees in the company chat program.

name: Mario Builder 64
description: A ROM hack for Super Mario 64 which turns the game into a Super Mario Maker-style level maker.

name: Mystery of the Sleeping Castle
description: The Mystery of the Sleeping Castle is a narrative detective game in the style of Case of the Golden Idol and Return of the Obra Dinn, but pinker, more fairytale, and EVERYBODY LIVES! (well, mostly) Make your way through the castle, observe clues and make deductions to solve puzzles, identify the residents, and ultimately release the castle from slumber

name: Petty Officer
description: You are a Compliance Officer for SPACEFLEET. Search for clues on your Compliance Console. Open your dossier to assemble your investigation, check your work, and bring Captain Braxton to justice. Click and Drag until the truth is revealed.

name: Beneath the Waves
description: A cruise ship makes an early return to Florida, but there is not a single passenger on board. FBI Shelly Clark is tasked with investigating the disappearances. Will she uncover the truth, or become lost like the others?

name: Asha Empire: Exodus
description: Asha Empire: Exodus is an exhilarating action shooter set in the expansive Asha Galaxy. Experience the intense final hours before the fall of Sirina, a critical imperial industrial military base, as Commander Rexis or Commander Kyra. Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy-occupied base, retrieve vital information, and escape before the Empire commences bombardment from space.

name: Dear Murder Diary
description: Dear Murder Diary is a text-based murder mystery type game, where the player tries to piece together who died and how by reading newspaper articles. Built from a simple gameplay loop where even the finest of detail can bring you closer to the truth.

name: 5-min-Clue
description: 5-min-Clue is small one-player RPG about being an amateur detective that somehow keeps getting involved in murder mysteries. There's no puzzle to solve, the die will tell you who, where, and how; you will have to think quick about the why, and deliver a summation worthy of the best amateur sleuths. Or not, just have fun.

name: Quiller's Code
description: Solve ciphers to uncover the identity of the Quiller.

name: Notes on a Mystery
description: This is a short mystery story where you have to pick the right words to answer questions.

name: Case of the Canvas
description: A prototype for a game in which you need to solve mysteries in a mythical museum with magical paintings.

name: Fowl Play
description: Visit post-WW1 London in a world run by birds, and try to solve your own murder while you're there. Mechanics heavily inspired by Case of The Golden Idol, could be considered a fan-made mod for the game.

name: WordDrag
description: You arrive in a mysterious place. Before you are tablets with letters on them. What secrets do they hold? Drag the tablets to find out...

name: Domovoy
description:
You are a Dom.0V0Y MDL 2.36. You are a robot vacuum cleaner tasked with maintaining the cleanliness of your owner's home during the night. You must make sure that you collect all of the dust within the house, or you may be returned to the store and/or scrapped for parts. Be wary for any sounds you hear; they may be indications of more dust appearing in the house.

You perceive your surroundings through your advanced LiDar scanner. Pressing space will scan the environment around you, creating a 3d snapshot for you to explore. Keep in mind, picking up dust will not remove the scanned version of it. However, it will not pick up on scans again. Make sure to scan often so that you have a clear view of your surroundings.

name: Detective.exe
description:
Welcome to the SQLPD. You, as the rookie on the force, are tasked with solving the only case not corrupted on our computer systems. Using our "latest" program: detective.exe.

Bring the murderer to justice.

name: R.R.S Cape
description:
You wake up confused inside the R.R.S Cape, a research submersible on an expedition to survey a newly discovered archipelago. As you come to your senses, you realise that you are stranded *somewhere* at the bottom of the sea & oxygen is quickly running out...

With limited air, a map & any clues you can gather from inside your soon-to-become coffin, can you deduce your precise location to call for a rescue mission before it is too late?

name: Implication
description:
Collect evidence and build cases against suspects to convince a jury of their peers to convict. Will you search hard for the real criminal? Or will you point the finger at someone else for your own benefit?

What comes first? Money? Happiness? Reputation? Justice? Play through each case to find out what becomes of you, your career, and your community.

name: I Love My Goblin Girlfriend
description: I Love My Goblin Girlfriend is a one-player point-and-click adventure game designed to explore the age-old question: what does your girlfriend want to eat? It’s all about the snacks in this three-part mystery to figure out how to satisfy your goblin gal and unlock the smooch of your dreams. After all, a goblin girl’s gotta eat!

name: Gatherings
description: Gatherings is a 4 player party game heavily focused on the quality of the minigames. Create a Lobby, gather your friends and just play ! No board, no overly long gamemodes, just pure fun, excitement and friendship destroying.

name: White Island
description: Welcome to Kvitøya Research Station. It's going to be chilly, so make sure to bring some extra socks! You have been invited to share your project as part of their research scholarship program. Everything is going to be perfect, until you get there and it's not.

name: Fortune Detective
description: A detective with the power to take over a person's mind must investigate the lives of three suspects before they can commit a horrendous act!

name: Jo-Zeas Gravity Adventure
description: Help Jo-Zeas solve puzzles and take back control of her ship. Control gravity to advance through the spaceship's rooms and overcome obstacles.

name: Twisted Detective
description: A mystery detective game set in a space station, you awaken from your hybernation early, only to find something has gone wrong.

name: Star Wars: Jedi Power Battles
description: Star Wars: Jedi Power Battles follows the story of Episode I: The Phantom Menace. The Game Boy Advance port featured 3 playable characters as opposed to 5 on the PS1 and Dreamcast, with only Obi-Wan, Qui-Gon, and Mace Windu being playable. The game alternates between an isometric view and side-scrolling.

name: Star Wars: Episode I - Jedi Power Battles
description: Choose your jedi (including Qui-Gon Jinn, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Mace Windu, Plo Koon, and Adi Gallia) and fight the forces of the Trade Federation through the planet Naboo, facing plenty of droids and Darth Maul himself. The Dreamcast version improves on the PS1 original with improved graphics and controls, along with an additional training mode and a two player duel mode.

name: Frame of Mind
description:
n the early hours of a dewy November day, Contessa Cornelia Foster reports her daughter, a renowned researcher and famous shut-in, missing from their manor. She was rumoured to be on the cusp of a major breakthrough. That morning, a bloodstain was found on the floor of her lab.

She’s not the only one unaccounted for. Her lab assistant and an artist-in-residence are also mysteriously absent.

Your clues are two crucial sources: A diary entry from the lab assistant and a sketch from the artist-in-residence, both dated the previous day. Their accounts are curiously contradictory.

Can you solve the inherent contradictions to crack the case of what truly happened?

name: Godzilla: Save the Earth - Melee
description: Godzilla: Save the Earth - Melee is a fan-made mod project by Godzilla fans for Godzilla fans. Originally beginning in 2021 as a simple "overhaul" of the 2004 game Godzilla: Save the Earth by Pipeworks Studios, STE Melee evolved over the years into an unofficial fully-fledged sequel to the Pipeworks Godzilla games we've all been waiting for!

name: Angel Killer
description: A non-linear murder mystery set in early 2000's with 22 different endings

name: Prelude Dark Pain
description: Prelude Dark Pain is a Tactical RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Assume the role of a local blacksmith named Soren, lead an uprising against the Order of the Ash Crusade and save a world ravaged by war.

name: Atari Classics Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Crazy Jack
description: Sin descripción

name: IdleCoin
description: IdleCoin is a real-time cryptocurrency mining and management simulation.

name: Five Nights At Maggies
description: This game is a fan game created by Michael Genaro. It is a FNAF (Five Nights At Freddys) remix/remake, click and point horror game, very difficult but very fun! Completely recommend! Also, This game is not mine however the actual developer has not added it to this site, and since it was made 2~3 months ago, i thought i would add it myself for him, the rest of the info is on the official (gamejolt) release site, i could not find any other.

description: A short horror game where you control a decaying spacecraft exploring distant star systems.

description: In EA SPORTS Madden NFL 25, discover the next level of FieldSENSE. This includes a re-engineered physics system, updated features across franchise and other modes as well as brand-new commentary and presentation.

description: Are you ready to become the best shooter?

description: Are you ready to answer the call of the wild and become the ultimate hunter?

name: Fantasy Beauties
description: Fantasy beauties are hidden behind puzzles – dare you unveil them?

name: Guess the Door
description: Sin descripción

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Memories of a Quintessential Summer
description: Based on the manga with the same name, it follows a new storyline that sees Futaro trapped with the girls on a tropical island as a brief summer getaway is stretched out over weeks. There, Futaro will interact with the sisters, Ichika, Nino, Miku, Yotsuba, and Itsuki, as well as Futaro's younger sister, Raiha. Players can unlock new artwork, costumes, and up to 14 endings. The gameplay promises a "heart-pounding desert island life" and a "five-girl tutoring adventure experience."

name: Truckz Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Project Mettrix
description: Sonic the Hedgehog: Project Mettrix is a fan game led by Stealth, created using his own E02 Game Engine. This platform makes this game available to DOS, Windows, Linux, MacOSX, PSP (CFW), and Wii (Homebrew Channel) users, and has allowed a significant amount of mechanical evolution from the game's earlier incarnations.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Gold Edition
description:
Experience an epic historical action-adventure story set in feudal Japan! Become a lethal shinobi Assassin and a powerful legendary samurai as you explore a beautiful open world in a time of chaos. Switch seamlessly between two unlikely allies as you discover their common destiny and usher in a new era for Japan.

Explore the captivating open world of feudal Japan, from spectacular castle towns and bustling ports to peaceful shrines and war-ravaged landscapes. Adventure through unpredictable weather, changing seasons, and reactive environments.

Become Naoe, a shinobi Assassin, and Yasuke, a legendary samurai, as you experience their riveting stories and master their complementary playstyles. As Naoe, use stealth to avoid detection and agility to confound your enemies. As Yasuke, strike your foes with lethal precision and power. Unlock new skills, gear, and progression independently for each character.

Make information your weapon as you explore the world, and build your own network of spies to be your eyes and ears across locations to hunt down your next target. Along the way, recruit new allies with unique abilities to help accomplish your missions.

Create a fully customizable hideout for your growing shinobi league as you train your crew, craft new gear, interact with key characters, and choose your base’s layout, decorations, and accessories.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Era of Decline
description: The Legend of Zelda: Era of Decline is a fan game based on the first The Legend of Zelda, aiming to be a remake for it. It was taken down by Nintendo after it received media coverage.

name: Sonic Legends
description: Sonic Legends is a non-profit fan project and re-imagining of classic, notable levels throughout the long-lasting history of Sonic fan games!

name: Minecraft: Minecraft Story Mode Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft: Minecon 2015 Skin Pack
description:
In Honer of Minecon 2015, claim this free skin pack ONLY available from July 1st too July 16th.

This DLC is expired and cannot be purchased anymore

name: Kanoso
description:
Slapstick parody of Key's Visual Novel Kanon

You play as 17-year-old Yuuichi Aizawa. Having trained in this madder-red city and left on a ascetic travel, you return to your hometown to determine who is the strongest...

name: Endeavor
description: A sci-fi real-time strategy game with free form base building and all of the typical features found in classic RTS offerings. Construct a base, collect resources, build defenses, train an army, research technology and destroy the enemy. Manage your army with unit formations, patrol routes and attack groups, reveal the enemy through fog of war, monitor the battlefield with radar, one-click support abilities, unique unit attacks, hero units, etc. Combat balanced with a rock-paper-scissor approach to unit balance.

name: Brad Blasts the Galactic Barbarians
description: The year is 2052. Earth-headquarters of the Intergalactic Security Network - is under threat of war. Can Special Space Service agent Brad Stevens locate and destroy the Galactic Brabarian's super power serum? The odds are a million to one against him on this maximum security mission!

name: Potty Painter
description:
The goal of the game is to join the dotted lines around a grid of squares each different in size with each valuing different points. In the meantime the player must avoid enemies who try to capture them. Starting the game, the player has 5 lives and 3 freezes which enable the player to freeze the computer controlled characters for around 10 seconds.

Levels alternate between playing as a monkey against tribesmen and playing as a paint-roller against teddy bears. Completing a level enables the player to play a bonus game which involves guiding a teddy bear to a banana to gain an extra 1000 points.

name: Yakuza GB
description: Yakuza GB is a de-make of Yakuza / Like A Dragon specifically made to run on actual GameBoy hardware! Take on the role of the legendary Kazuma Kiryu and navigate through Kamurocho taking on anyone who dares to question you. Tired of brawling? Head to space in Ono Michio Space Defence; A short space shooter starring the beloved mascot.

name: Diatomic
description: Diatomic is the movement shooter with gun juggling, epic boss fights, hardcore parkour and more blood and chaos than the term "fantasy violence" should probably allow for! Kill - Steal weapon - kill again!

name: Brain Puzzles Bundle 12 in 1
description: 10 great brain puzzle games in one bundle!

name: Life Sim Bundle
description: Become a Michelin-starred restaurateur, an enthusiastic gardener and a rail company manager!

name: My Universe Discovery Collection 2
description: Discover the My Universe range of games with this 4 game bundle including : - My Universe - Puppies & Kittens - My Universe - Pet Clinic Cats & Dogs - My Universe - My Baby Dragon - My Universe - Green Adventure : Farmers Friends

name: Treasure Guardian: Collector Shift Defender's Saga
description: Defend, Collect, Prevail: Safeguard the Fortune, Secure Your Honor!

name: Tip Top Table Tennis
description: Tip Top Table Tennis is a realistic table tennis experience with 4 exciting game modes for the whole family!

name: Tic-Tac-Toe Bolt
description: Tic-Tac-Toe Bolt is an LCD game that contains 3 Tic-Tac-Toe games. The games include Infinite Tic-Tac-Toe, Memory Flash and Cover-up Tic-Tac-Toe.

name: Captain America: Brave New World
description: Captain America: Brave New World was a McDonald's promotional browser game made in part of their May 2024 Captain America: Brave New World Happy Meal campaign. The game was playable exclusively in America via mobile devices.

name: The Match
description: Here is the video game “The Match”! Released in 1991 on ZX Spectrum, it's still available and playable with some tinkering. It's a sports game, set in a managerial and soccer / football (european) themes and it was released on Amstrad CPC and Commodore 64 as well.

name: Toca Hair Salon 3
description: Welcome to Toca Hair Salon 3! Our most popular app series returns, better than ever! What do you feel like creating today — something quirky, pretty or edgy? Choose your character from dozens of looks that you can customize — characters have randomized styles and personalities, which creates endless play opportunities! Grab your tools and get styling!

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - Jabba's Palace Character Pack
description: The dregs of the galaxy’s criminal underworld come to LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens with Jabba’s Palace Pack. This character pack includes the mighty Jabba the Hutt and his loyal retainers Bib Fortuna, Malakili and Gamorrean Guards, plus the bounty hunter Boushh, band leader Max Rebo, dancer Oola, and Princess Leia in her Jabba’s prisoner costume.

name: Pasteman Pat
description:
Pat Splatt, the best poster paster in Groove-Town, has his work cut out for him. After spending all day yesterday putting up posters he has found out that his rival, Nasty Norville has messed them up. You play as Pat as he attempts to put the posters back to normal within a time limit. Before you play the game you can select which level to play from a choice of 12. These are split into three groups which are Kids Stuff, Smart Alec and Mensa Only and each level is harder than the last one but with a higher time limit. The first poster is just a grid of 2x2 while the last poster is 8x8 and when one is completed you see a tick beside the level you have completed. You can attempt any level at any time and if you fail one then you can attempt it again later.

The game is viewed from behind Pat on his ladder with a small part of the poster shown and the screen scrolls when you move Pat in multiple directions. With your brush you slide the pieces of the poster by a full row or a full column so forward planning is required. In the bottom right corner is a sign for the toilet and if you press down you can see what the poster should look like, a press of the fire button shows the poster with the grid on it and finally another press of the fire button and you see what the poster is looking like at that moment. As you move the pieces around the screen you have to avoid missiles being thrown at you by Norville's henchmen and if you are hit by one you lose one of five lives. Failing to complete the level within the time limit and you fail the level and back to the level select screen. Also seen on the screen is a percentage of how much of the poster is completed.

name: Erumani
description: A fantasy SRPG.

name: O to Z
description: A fantasy SRPG.

name: Entity
description: Entity is a game about a girl who wakes up with sleep paralysis, a stage between awake and dreaming. She's struggling with moving her body while she's surrounded by shadow creatures, she needs your help to wake up!

name: The Executive
description: Shape the history of the Hollywood movie industry in this sandbox business simulation game. Create the movies you've always wanted to see, hire the best team, research cutting-edge technologies, and dominate the Box Office. Can you rise from a small studio to a Hollywood giant?

name: Dreamcore95idle.exe
description: dreamcore inspired incremental game with vaporwave aesthetics

name: PuzzleStones
description: PuzzleStones is a match-3 puzzle game where players make horizontal or vertical lines on a grid with a variety of scoring methods.

name: Syzygy
description: A dialog-only interactive fiction game where you play the role of Diplomat Calliope, charged with maintaining good relations with the planet Syzygy.

name: VHS Slaughter
description: VHS Slaughter is a game attempting to recreate the atmosphere of VHS 80's films and classic PSX horror games.

description: Sin descripción

name: Worms Rumble: Emote Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: UFO Robot Grendizer: The Feast of the Wolves - Princely Outfit
description: Climb aboard Grendizer the Legendary Robot and fight the forces of evil

name: Wales Interactive Publisher Bundle
description: Wales Interactive have bundled six great games including the recent hit FMV titles, Late Shift and The Bunker. Soul Axiom and Knee Deep round up the story-rich adventure games and if you're looking for fast-paced action at super speeds then look no further than Coffin Dodgers and Infinity Runner!

name: RuneStone Keeper & YourToy & Distrust Bundle

You get 4 loops of the same 2 minutes in which to find the 3 terrorists, find the code, and diffuse the bomb.
