description: In this text based game you assume the role of Sister Constance, a member of a secret organization responsible for delivering the Death Curse to marked targets. A new job has been assigned to you, but in order to end your target you must gather the ingredients and make choices.

name: Spookids
description: Spooky Land is a mysterious and treacherous place, but none of that will stop a group of mischievous kids' search for candy! Defeat monsters, avoid traps and collect candy in this shoot'em up adventure for up to 4 players coop.

name: Spooky Cooking
description: Have a nice Halloween in a lovely and casual way with a one-button game that tries to bring back the competition of the arcade era, where you need to shoot a pumpkin towards to a cauldron while dodging obstacles, a simple mechanic that's easy to understand, but hard to master, this game can please casual gamers as well as hardcore ones.

name: Thursday the 12th
description: In this first person adventure, you help our friendly serial killer Johnny in his routine, searching for all the stuff he needs to prepare for his big day. Interact with the items you find or inspect them to know what’s going through Johnny’s mind.

name: Tower of 100 Floors
description: Explore a creepy, demon-filled dungeon with 100 floors and save your city from certain doom with Sewer Cat and his partner Dirty Paws in this classic rogue-like style adventure!

name: Worship The Demon Lord With Friends
description: A 2-player party game where you compete with a friend to see who is the best worshiper of the demon lord!

name: G-Police
description:
A 2024 port of G-Police, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

G-Police is a 1997 combat flight simulator set in a hypothetical future where corporations lead space colonies. The player is Jeff Slater, a futuristic helicopter pilot who joins the G-Police to investigate his sister's death.

name: Nemesis Tamatou
description:
You play a character named "7735", thrown into a deadly Game Show known as "Nemesis Tamatou" for the entertainment of the enigmatic "BLB Crew" and their stream viewers. On your way, you can buy upgrades in the shop aiding you on your journey, meet new friends along the way (or kill them for cash) and experience the overall insanity (along with a subtle identity crisis).
This game is based on the personalities and the humor of the BLB Show Youtube Channel.

name: Michael Jackson: The Experience
description: Sin descripción

name: Michael Jackson: The Experience
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmic Trip
description:
"Long ago in the Cosmic Universe exists a world where one can only access by sleeping...

Rhyme - The Goddess Of Dreams is the creator of said world who resides in her floating castle, One night a Nightmarish being known as "Wizzmare" invades her world and imprisons her in his locket.

With the goddess of dreams incapacitated - Wizzmare spreads his power throughout the land by unleashing nightmarish monsters who spread havoc.

All seemed hopeless...

However there is a young girl named "Mel" who sleeping during this time, arrives to the dream realm and discovers monsters all over the place.

It's up to this plucky child to save the dream goddess and restore this realm back to the paradise it was!!

name: Junk
description:
The more you have, the worse it is for other people.

Junk is a variation of the familiar falling-blocks puzzle game. When you start a game of Junk, you don’t play on an empty board. Instead, you play on the finishing board of someone else’s game. And when you’re done, any mistakes you make, all junk you collect, will become another's problem in due time, for all time.

Junk requires an internet connection to play.

name: Panomino
description: The rogue-like deck-building falling-block puzzle-game

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Ultra Cruiser Boat Pack
description: Navigate tight waterways easily with the practical new Ultra Cruiser! This flat-bottomed Jon Boat is small in size and constructed of sturdy middle-grade aluminum, allowing you to explore shallow waters and find more fish.

name: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth - Sujimon & Resort Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: R-Type Final 2: B-99 Apocalypse R-Craft
description: Sin descripción

name: Hawked: Diamond Raider Pack
description: Discover the most secret, arcane treasures of X-Isle with the Diamond Raider Pack. Includes a Renegade Pass, exclusive Color Scheme, Oufits, gear, currency, and much more!

name: Hawked: Amethyst Raider Pack
description: Let the legend of the Disciple Hunter rise with the Amethyst Raider Pack. Includes fearsome Renegade Outfits, gear, currency, and much more!

name: Killing Floor 2: S12 Shockgun Weapon Bundle
description: A semi-automatic shotgun with a penchant for electrically enforced social distancing. The S12 Shockgun is designed for the Support perk and comes with 5 unique skin variants.

name: Minecraft: Legends - Deluxe Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Cities: Skylines - Remastered: Industries
description: Sin descripción

name: Outbreak: Lydia Daniels Collection
description: Uncover the origins of an undead epidemic then shoot your way out arcade-style in this zombie overflowing double feature.

name: Murder Diaries Series Bundle
description: This bundle features the Murder Diaries Series - a pack of 3 story-driven flight exploration games. In each of the games you will experience an exciting murder story while exploring the landscapes and piecing together the overall story.

name: Aquarium in Cafe
description: This game bundle combines "Aquarium Designer" and "Cafe Owner Simulator," offering players the chance to design and manage both an aquarium and a restaurant. "Aquarium Designer" invites creativity in building and populating diverse underwater habitats, while "Cafe Owner Simulator" focuses on crafting a unique dining experience through detailed customization and staff management. Each game emphasizes strategic planning, design aesthetics, and business acumen, appealing to a broad audience with interests in biology, culinary arts, and entrepreneurship. Despite their different settings, both games challenge players to balance functionality with aesthetic appeal, enhancing their skills in resource management and strategic decision-making. Together, they provide a comprehensive simulation experience that blends creativity with critical thinking in engaging and educational ways.

name: Aery: Calm Mind Bundle
description:
This bundle features the games of the Aery - Calm Mind series. These ganmes are an interactive game experiences that are designed to relax your mind and soul.
You jump into the role of a little bird, explore beautiful landscapes and collect magical crystals that mark certain landscapes.
Because there are no enemies or any other danger in this game you will be able to lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying. It is a great game for relaxing and calming down after an exhausting day full of hassle.
Of course, you can always select the level that you feel helps most to relax yourself. Most levels can be finished quite quickly so that you can freely choose spend time exploring the environment but you don't have to stay for too long if you are just looking for a short moment of peace and enjoyment.
This game features a collection of some the most beautiful sceneries from the Aery franchise.
We hope you like them. So lean back and take a deep breath.

name: DOSMan: Space Aliens in Space!
description: Planet DOS is under attack by Space Aliens, DOSMan needs to fend them off and defend his home planet.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Premium Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Sker Collectors Bundle
description: Wales Interactive is proud offer you the Sker Collectors edition including Sker Ritual and Maid of Sker all in one Sker-y bundle.

name: Killing Floor 2: Last Stand Outfit Bundle
description: Comes with the Last Stand Outfit and head gear (includes 6 skin styles). Compatible with most characters.

name: Skull and Bones: Deluxe Edition
description:
Enter the perilous world of Skull and Bones, a co-op pirate open world action-RPG experience, to become the most infamous pirate kingpin!

Deluxe Edition includes two additional missions plus digital art book and soundtrack.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes the full game, the 2024 Track Pass with 18 additional tracks and the 2024 Vehicle Pass which adds over 30 original vehicles to the already huge base game!
Get into MX vs ATV Legends with this special discounted bundle!

name: Sker Ritual: Deluxe Edition
description:
An intense, round-based, zombie horror shooter by Wales Interactive. Play solo or up-to 4-players online, facing relentless waves of Quiet Ones whilst solving mysterious missions, uncovering Easter Eggs, upgrading steampunk weapons and obtaining Miracles — a vast network of Celtic God powers.

• Old-school round-based FPS action
• Play solo or up-to 4-players online
• Story continued from Maid of Sker ‘evil' ending
• Optional objectives & hidden Easter Eggs
• Supercharged ‘Elites' with unique abilities
• Collect and enhance 'Miracle' powers
• Explore free reward systems ‘Dread Levels' and ‘Sker Pass'

name: Death Park Bundle
description: This bundle features 3 terrifying horror games - the iconic Death Park 1 & 2 and the horrifying Antarctica88. Are you ready to face your deepest fears?

name: Killing Floor 2: Reaper Outfit Bundle
description: Comes with the Reaper Outfit (includes 6 of skin styles). Compatible with most characters.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Easternvard Renaissance Edition
description: The Easternvard Overseers established their reputation by saving the entire queen's guard from an ill-fated ambush.

name: The Talos Principle Collection
description: This bundle includes The Talos Principle: Deluxe Edition and The Talos Principle 2.

name: Tin Can + Starward Rogue: Survive in Space Bundle Deluxe
description: Survive in space with cunning and knowledge, or shoot your way to freedom!

name: Morbid: The Lords & Acolytes Bundle
description: Gruesome, gory and ghoulish! Dive into the horror-themed worlds of Morbid: The Seven Acolytes and Morbid: The Lords of Ire.

name: Tactical Warfare Bundle
description: This bundle contains FRONT MISSION 1st: Remake & FRONT MISSION 2: Remake

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Gold Fishing Bundle
description: Get the Gold Fishing Bundle and gain access to the base game, the Spain Reserve, the Norway Reserve, and the South Africa Reserve, as well as the stylish T-Shirt Pack!

name: Beat of Montezuma
description:
Rhythm and music style game with 80-s vibes will surprise you with new mechanics.
Go through portal labyrinths of the mysterious supreme idol and collect all coins.
Don't waste time, feel the rhythm of Montezuma!

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 2024 Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Bundle
description: Get Trailmakers alongside our latest expansion: The Rescue Pack! Jump right into the game with full access to 9x new Rescue-themed blocks, 4x new outfits and 16x new decals.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Silver Fishing Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Bazookarrots
description:
Carrot juice squeezing game for MSX2.

Pick up CARRORS and bring them to the JUICER!

Beware of BUNNIES!

You can use your CARROT BAZOOKA to eliminate the threats!

name: The Psychological Horror Bundle
description:
The Psychological Horror Bundle brings you three intense and reflective world-acclaimed story driven horrors bundled together at a reduced price!

Burnhouse Lane
Jump into a terrifying adventure from the masters of horror, that will take you to dark places and make you smile, cry and question life. Finish hopeless tasks to win your life back. Solve puzzles, make friends (and enemies), run, hide and fight your way through peril.

Buddy Simulator 1984
The technology is finally here! We utilised the next generation of AI science to simulate the experience of hanging out with your best buddy. He learns and adapts to your personality!

Afterdream
Get lost in a lucid dream, bending the lines between reality and fiction. Utilize the strange camera to navigate through the ghosts' mysterious residence.

name: The Survival Horror Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Prison of Illusion: Ultimate Edition
description: A young vampire is imprisoned in a supposedly abandoned castle. Help him escape from this magical prison. This version also includes other complete games.

name: Jagmatch
description: Jagmatch is an Atari Jaguar homebrew in which the player has to match Atari computers and consoles to games considered most iconic for each system. Essentially, it requires good short-term memory, but also solid long-term memory as far as Atari gaming history is concerned! To reveal a tile, press A on the controller.

name: Prison of Illusion
description: A young vampire is imprisoned in a supposedly abandoned castle. Help him escape from this magical prison.

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Deluxe Bundle
description: This pack contains all you need for the ultimate Rescue experience. The full arsenal of Trailmakers combined with all the live-saving blocks of the Rescue Pack - tried and tested against the ruthless, intense waves of the High Seas DLC. The latter of which can now be applied to all maps in Trailmakers.

name: Kobayashi Maru: Final
description:
An Atari Jaguar CD homebrew game that is heavily inspired by Konami's arcade game Time Pilot. Kobayashi Maru is a 50/60 fps rotary action shooter for the Atari Jaguar games console and was written utilising a version of RAPTOR API by Reboot. It can be played with either a rotary controller (such as Chaos Reins, Tyrant or Jonathan Ascough pad) or a regular Jaguar joypad.

Xu’s United Nations Tetrad are under simultaneous attack from The Ebil Alliance. All that stands between TEA and the XUNTS is you and your warpships. You are the only officer capable of piloting these ships and are therefore the last hope of all XUNT-kind.

As your prototype warpships do not come fitted with stabilising or reverse thrusters, your ship tears around the upper atmosphere with regular engines at full output. Your task is to steer the warpship, avoid collisions and kill the attacking drones. Once the required number of drones have been dispatched, their mothership will arrive and attempt to seek revenge. Defeat this mothership and you’ll charge your warp engines and be off to the next planet where you’ll find new drones are on the attack.

Some drones have taken your fellow XUNTs hostage – you are able to rescue these falling hostages by catching them with your ship, but beware – if you destroy their baloonachutes they’ll fall much more quickly. Chain hostage rescues for increased bonuses, lose a warpship and the chain will reset.

As you defeat drones, your allies below collect their wreckage, recycle it and construct further warpships for your use. 1st extra warpship at 20,000 and every 50,000 afterwards. Lose a warpship and your allies will transport a new one to your position. TEA wins when you no longer have any warpships to replace your damaged vessel.

name: Age of Water: Silver Edition
description: Includes in-game currency (1000 Corks and 100 000 Medallions). Corks will come in handy when you need to buy in-game resources from vendors and repair your ship to advance faster through the game, where medallions can be used to purchase decorations. Replaces four default common boats with upgraded boats of the Barracuda team.

name: Isonzo: Ultimate Edition
description: The Isonzo Ultimate Edition includes every visual customization option the game has to offer: 100s of items from 10 DLCs!

name: SuperFly DX
description: SuperFly DX is a horizontally scrolling action game with deceptively simple one-button control and rock-solid 50/60fps gameplay. Beneath the initial simplicity lies a challenge to test the skills of even the very best gamers.

name: Age of Water: Gold Edition
description: Includes in-game currency (3000 Corks and 250 000 Medallions). Corks will come in handy when you need to buy in-game resources from vendors and repair your ship to advance faster through the game, where medallions can be used to purchase decorations. Replaces four default common boats with upgraded boats of the Barracuda team and three ordinary crew members with crewmen from the Barracuda team.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes the full game, 9 DLCs with over 60 additional tracks plus the 2024 Vehicle Pass with over 30 original manufacturer vehicles!

Get this ultimate bundle for a special price!

name: Summer and Winter Sports Games Bundle: 4K Edition
description: 18 sports for 1 to 4 players!

name: Clear Skye Thinking
description:
Alice Shah doesn’t want to go on holiday to Scotland, and she most definitely doesn’t want to go to grey, dreary Skye.

Alice has a love for elegant, classy clothes, and she spends hours on her appearance every morning. Alice considers herself a sophisticated, elegant lady, and she has no desire to go tramping through muddy fields to visit crumbling old castles.

Unfortunately for Alice, however, her dad is determined to spend their summer in Skye so he can meet up with a former friend, Ian Carter, and his family: his wife, the haughty Hilda, and their ginger spawn, the loud and boisterous Piper.

Alice hasn’t seen Piper since they were small children, and she has few memories of her. She doubts that she’ll be able to get on with anybody who lives on a teeny-tiny island full of sheep, but Alice is pleasantly surprised.

Piper isn’t as abrasive as her father, or as stuck-up as her mother. Piper is cheerful and laid-back, and she takes a liking to Alice almost at once.

A friendship begins to blossom between the two girls – but what will happen when Alice’s holiday ends and she has to go back to London?

name: Prison of Illusion: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ants
description:
Why spend hundreds of dollars on pest control? Why hire strange, overweight, smelly men with tanks on their backs to come into your home, squirting fowl smelling liquids all over your precious preciouses? THAT'S RIGHT! You have the power to stop your home infestation and free yourself from these ant invaders! JUST SQUISH THEM WITH YOUR FINGER! That's right, that same finger you just had crammed up your nose for the last 15 minutes! Put that picker to work and get to squishing!

Ants is a unique game about getting rid of
common household pests using nothing
but your finger. The game contains
options designed to drastically change
the gameplay depending on what options
you select prior to play. Not all options
will be available the first time you play. You will need to unlock all of the special options by achieving certain high scores throughout the game.

name: Turbo Dash Kart 2024 Racing
description:
Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush with our action-packed kart racing game. Choose your champion driver, customize your ride, and dominate challenging tracks to become the undisputed ruler of the asphalt jungle! Buckle up for a heart-pounding adventure where strategy and skill meet lightning-fast laps.

With stunning graphics and endless upgrades, this game promises an unforgettable ride for all speed enthusiasts. Become a racing legend in this adrenaline-fueled adventure! So, buckle up! The race begins now!

name: Knights and Magic Bundle
description:
"This bundle includes:

Chronicles of Magic: Divided Kingdom
Queen's Quest: Stories of Forgotten Past
King's Heir: Rise to the Throne"

name: Roads of Time Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Fast Food 64
description: FAST FOOD 64 is the flagship game of WAVE 1 GAMES. Released in 2017 it was our very first official release for the Atari Jaguar console. This is a spiritual successor to the Atari 2600 game FAST FOOD by Telesys. In this game you take on the role of Mighty Mouth, a disembodied pair of hungry lips who is on a munching binge, You must watch out for the dreaded PURPLE PICKLES because if you accidently eat too many Mighty Mouth will get indigestion and die! This game has 5 differnt game modes including a recreation of the Atari 2600 game. Since it's release the game has gotten a lot of attention and if you're hungry for something a little bizzare check this one out!

name: Fast Food 64: Holiday Snacks
description: Make no mistake, Fast Food 64: Holiday Snacks is not just a Christmas re-skin of Fast Food 64. It is a BRAND NEW game with an entirely new code base written from the ground up. FAST FOOD 64 has returned for a Holiday inspired TRUE sequel! In Fast Food 64: Holiday Snacks you can play in one of 3 exciting arcade style game modes! The game also features a Christmas techno soundtrack with 5 music tracks, all of which are MP3 quality sound! You will hear these jamming beats in the different game modes, or you can listen to them as you wish in the games' Music Test Mode.

name: Full Circle: Rocketeer
description: Taking cues from Jetpac, Full Circle: Rocketeer is a shooter game where players assume the role of Space Corps commander Gwyn Williams, who must rebuild his vessel that was broken into several fragments and refill it with fuel to take off into another planet, while avoiding flying enemies and obstacles that will prevent you from escaping.

name: Nonsense
description:
Welcome to Nonsense! A variety collab in every sense of the word, this hack features contributions from numerous level authors across the SMW community.

You’ll encounter many wild gimmicks and strange ideas throughout this hack. However, at its heart, Nonsense is about classic standard platforming. You’ll find very little in the way of puzzles or Kaizo here, but your platforming skills will truly be put to the test.

name: Roomba Ruckus
description:
Why do cats randomly bolt around the house at 10:51 PM?

The answer, my dear reader, is simple. They're protecting their homes. You see, cats have been fighting an endless war for centuries against a nearly invisible menace: Dust Bunnies.

Every night, these mischievous little creatures rise up from the cracks in the floorboards to cause havoc, but our faithful felines stop them in their tracks.

In all this time, all the cats have been able to do is break even. They stop the bunnies, but expend all their energy for the day simply holding them off until the next. (Why do you think cats nap all the time? They're exhausted!)

Today, though, the tides turn in the cats' favor with the latest technology on offer.
Enter: The Roomba

With this dust-defeating droid, the cats don't need to lift a paw to protect their people! Finally, they can diligently defeat their fearsome foes!

name: Chocolate Factory
description:
Build your dream Chocolate Factory among candy cane forests and gumdrop hills to produce the tastiest sweets.
A delicious first-person factory automation game with a little exploration and combat.
Confectionary conveyor belt heaven awaits!

name: Vacuum Balaena
description:
Take a short while and enter in an underwater world and embody a whale named Melouchax. Explore the depth of the ocean, and try to answer to your own needs, which are : breathin' and eatin' fishes. But be careful to not eat different kind of trash which draws into swarm of fishes, or you're going to accumulate to much CO2 inside you.

This game exists thanks to the NUPES Game Jam. During 32 hours we work on it, we also pick the theme which is about the pollution and how critical it is.

name: A Missing Salesman
description: A missing salesman - This is a short first-person horror game (psx/ps1). At first glance it may seem that the game is quite simple, but to understand its meaning you need to go through it carefully to the end. The game has a tense atmosphere, screemers and sharp sounds.

name: Vermin Kids
description: Sin descripción

name: Compress Space: Expanded
description: A puzzle-game where you can compress space.

name: Horse Mansion
description: Horse Mansion is an atmospheric horror game where the player must find items and solve puzzles in order to explore more of the mansion. However, the player quickly finds they are not alone...

name: Helmo Online
description: Helmo is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game created for people who love this style of gameplay. Even though it is a modern and advanced game, Helmo also has a unique and classic graphic. We are in the initial testing phase, looking for possible bugs and improving gameplay. The game will change a lot as we are still in development.

name: Fishing Fantasy: Buzzrod
description:
Possum, an archaeologist from the Kingdom of Emgrand, does no research and does nothing but fish. One day, while out on an adventure , possum finds a note in his missing uncle's book about a mysterious ancient civilization that worship fish as messengers of gods.
Possum sets out on a journey with his favorite rod in order to get closer to his admired uncle, a famous archaeologist, and above all, to meet a fish he has never seen before.

name: Drill Core
description: Corporate greed meets strategic planet-mining in Drill Core! Drill to the heart of planets while managing workers, researching cutting-edge tech, and fortifying against alien attacks. Will you prioritize efficiency and risk your workers' safety, or focus on defense for survival?

name: Neden
description: Step into the fantastic world of Neden and create your unique character! You can meet new friends and explore thrilling game modes like deathmatch, battle royale, survival, and much more. But what exactly is Neden?

name: Seaburn
description: Seaburn is a choice-based political simulator where your choices affect the future of the planet. Play as a policymaker as you sign legislations, respond to events, and attend interviews with drama-seeking journalists. Try to balance your popularity with the environment's health.

name: Tetram
description: TETRAM is a blend of mechanics reminiscent of classic block games with card memorization and spatial location. It's an innovative mechanic for those who enjoy games with similar gameplay.

name: Cazzarion: Zombie Drive
description: Sin descripción

name: Neon Bash
description: Sin descripción

name: Warlords of the Deck
description: We've fused Card Gaming with the Battle of Total War to create the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Combine a unique deck from different factions, rally your legions, and charge to defeat all your opponents!

name: Taquero Simulator
description: Clients are piling up, and they won't wait for long, mijo. Are you ready for the challenge? Prende your grill, chop your vegetables, and grab your carnes, it's time to become el mejor taquero there has ever been!

name: Crabity
description: Embark on a cosmic adventure as a duo of two robot crabs stranded in the vastness of space. See the world from a different angle and utilize the power of gravity to escape the space station and return back to Earth!

name: Neverseas
description:
Ahoy, captain! Welcome and join us to find out the untold tale of Neverseas, where time and space is a dream and you are a sand grain in an endless lost sea that careless wanderer can fall into. The main question is are you brave enough to dive into it?

Neversas is an open-world sandbox action RPG from a third-person perspective. The game takes place in the era of graceful sailing ships and pirate romance, and you are invited to try yourself in the role of a real captain of a sailing ship. Here you have to manage a team, monitor the condition of ships, improve and modernize them, and you must also not forget about individual equipment, because on land you will not protect several of the modern capabilities of your ship.

name: Code Of Superheroes
description: A strategic turn-based game where you play a superhero in a randomly generated world. Battle villains, play side games and experience many different adventures with lots of choices and variation.

name: H Girl 4
description: Swap tiles to reveal 5 characters with NSFW jiggle physics images. Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level. Completed puzzles can be viewed later in the gallery. Swap, match and have love!

name: Ocean Planet
description: Ocean Planet takes the ideas & gameplay of "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and treats it as an art form, with atmospheric & immersive visuals and audio. You will be plunged into a diverse aquatic world, and it is up to you to rise up and see what awaits you at the surface.

name: Slime Coming
description: Slimes have invaded the world! 6 heroes have to save the world and investigate the cause. Slime Coming is a casual game with light rogue-like elements and survivor type. Fully automatic attack, through upgrades, strengthen your hero and defeat slimes and monsters.

name: Pilgrim
description:
Pilgrim is a medieval-based, co-op horror, adventure. Can you and your friends make it to the end of The Road?

Immerse yourself in the dark otherworldly horror of the medieval. A long and dangerous road awaits the chosen Pilgrims. You will journey to find out what lies at the end of the road.

Thrust from the safety of your Village, given little supplies and a powered wagon. Take yourself and your companions through a dark world to find what awaits you along this winding path.

To survive you’ll have to delve deep into crypts, unlock dimly lit dungeons, explore the derelict towns and try not to lose yourself in the twisting woodlands.

name: The Cyclop
description: Embark on a journey of precision and determination in "Cyclop," where every move counts and every decision shapes your ascent.

name: No Rules Box!
description: In this intense and action-packed game, you will forget about the rules of traditional boxing and instead, focus on using weapons to take down your opponent.

name: Frog 'n' Roll
description: Roll around as a cute little frog, shoot waves of bugs and upgrade your weapons in this arcade shooter, Frog 'n' Roll!

name: Hexxaris
description: Swipe lines in three ways to clear the board and achieve high-scoring combos!

name: Ladder Climbing
description: The little monsters are trapped here, you have to find a way out...Be careful of the traps on the road, replenish nutrients in time, and don't give these disobedient little monsters a chance to lose their temper!!!

name: Mage vs. Castle
description: You need to concentrate, dodge everything that moves and avoid touching the edges.

name: Manludo
description: Play rock, paper, scissors to get off an alien space station. Esperanto: Vi devas ludi papero, tondilo, ŝtono por forlasi eksterteran kosmostacion.

name: Limits of Intelligence
description: Create your own machine. Engineer it!

name: Her Shoes
description: En is a sexy and beautiful high heel sales consultant, the player will play her in the game for female guests to take off shoes, massage feet, wear shoes and other work.

name: Ruiga Pirates: Cursed Seas
description: Defeat legions of pirates and marine beasts to emerge victorious in Ruiga Pirates: Cursed Seas! Adventure with survival elements. Customize your ship, prepare for barrages from myriad foes, and navigate the perilous waters of a monster realm. Embark on this thrilling journey and Play for Free now!

name: The Specter's Desire
description: This year's Desire Hierarchy has begun. The stakes are now deadly. Hop into The Specter's Desire, a Visual Novel in which you play against the city's top talents to save your parents. Includes puzzling gameplay that has you tearing down arguments, hatching schemes, and revealing the truth!

name: War of Zanzor III: Birth of Unity
description: A traditional turn based RPG with a huge focus on story. An endless evil plagues the world but are they truly evil? Watch the world change before your eyes as the universe reaches its end! Save the universe from the secrets of your world in War of Zanzor III: Birth of Unity!

name: Grapple Flow VR
description: Master the art of traversal with grappling hooks, swinging through awe-inspiring environments. With precise controls, engage in high-flying acrobatics. Prepare to elevate your gaming experience with this adrenaline-fueled adventure!

name: Sentinel of Innocence
description: Be the defender of innocence, the last remaining virtue in this land, and prevail against the evildoers! Sentinel of Innocence is a survival game with tower defense and rogue-lite elements.

name: Escape The Forest
description: Can you escape the forest? Experience the isolation of being the last person in the dark woods. Uncover the mysteries of your missing neighbors and discover who or what took them from their homes, all while escaping with your life.

name: WooLoop: Video Games Pack
description: Video Games GalleryThis Video Game-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Classic to Modern, 8-bit to 4k, this gallery explores all corners of the Video Games industry!

name: The Hell in I
description: Dare to step into the darkness, and discover the echoes of agony that linger within the walls of St. Agnes Mental Institution. Can you survive the night as you solve puzzles and mysteries of the asylum?

name: Poseidon
description: Poseidon wants to return his beloved golden sharks back to the Greek seas, go to a small island and help God find his subjects!)

name: Save Daddy Trump 4: Maga 2024
description: Election is coming and 3 evil bosses has again captured Daddy Trump and his Kiki daughter need save him again

name: Morphscape: The Stylized Prop Pursuit
description: Welcome to Morphscape, an immersive and exhilarating stylized prop hunt game that sets the stage for a thrilling cat-and-mouse chase amidst visually captivating and creatively designed levels.

name: Color Splash: Fairies
description: Color Splash: Fairies is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable fairies and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful fairies paintings.

name: The Rainman
description: Watch your back in the small peaceful town of Crystalpine Grove, as it is haunted by The Infamous Rainman.

name: Drone Adventure
description: Drone, Guns, Open World, GPL3

name: InstaTok Tycoon
description: "InstaTok Tycoon " is a blogger simulator in the Tycoon genre that immerses you in the exciting world of digital marketing.

name: The Artifact of Ancients
description: Embark on an epic journey with a courageous band of adventurers as they brave perilous landscapes and face formidable foes in their pursuit of a long-lost relic of unimaginable power.

name: Brain Tester: Mind Trick Quiz 2
description: This game is about riddles and mind trick quiz with all the reason needed for each answer. You will need higher brain power than previous one to clear this game

name: Pudding Juice
description: Manage your resources and your factory to produce enough pudding juice to satisfy the customers who will come each day.

name: The Echoes of Mars
description: A tower defence strategy game with a voxel-styled design, set against the backdrop of the red planet. Ancient Martian creatures emerge from Korolev Crater ice, threatening a research base. Protect it while revealing the planet's hidden secrets through strategic gameplay.

name: Our War: The Strongest Shield
description: A grand and intense tower defense science fiction game, where you only need to purchase once to enjoy all the content of the game.

name: Falco Tunes
description: Falco Tunes is a fun arcade game where you have to collect notes and attack harsh animals with them!

name: Gracia
description: Gracia is the world's first platform for viewing and publishing free-viewpoint ultra-photorealistic VR experiences. It's not just about seeing; it's about stepping inside a photo with freedom to walk around, where every detail is so vivid, you'll forget it's virtual.

name: Stairway
description: Get out of the building via the stairway. Observe the levels carefully for a successful exit.

name: Tale of the Singing Peaks
description: This game is a 2D Pixel Art Narrative Puzzle Platformer created by Quantum Lemon Interactive in cooperation with the talented artists at Xueshu Game Studios. Game Features: 2D Platforming; Single Player Co-op Gameplay; Puzzle-Solving; NPC Interactions;

name: Eerie Excavation
description: Eerie Excavation is a first person horror game. You wander into haunted mines in search of quick fame and fortune, but will you make it out alive ?

name: Mirrorscape: Outdoor Starter Pack
description: Jump right into the action with the Outdoor Starter Pack! Play around the table or around the world using authentic 3D terrain, miniatures, and environmental effects from top companies you know and love. Cross-play on iOS and Android devices using the magic of augmented reality!

name: Mirrorscape: Deluxe Starter Pack
description: Jump right into the action with the Deluxe Game Master's Edition! Play around the table or around the world using authentic 3D terrain, miniatures, and environmental effects from top companies you know and love. Cross-play on iOS and Android devices using the magic of augmented reality!

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Vol. 7 Premium Speed Pass
description: The Vol. 7 Premium Speed Pass immediately grants the new Ford Mustang Dark Horse ‘24 and opens up access to its bodykits plus 3 Custom versions of the new Vol. 7 cars. You'll also gain access to sick, new customizations — over 30 content tiers.

name: Moonstone Island: Arcane Artifacts
description: This DLC is entirely centered around that mysterious weirdo that you love to love, with new dialogue, new events, and lots of Magic Man-themed furniture to make a shrine out of. We see you.

name: Marble Madness
description: Marble Madness is a tense and exciting pinball card building game. Using pinball collision as the main gameplay, supplemented by card construction, each game has a different experience, so experience the exhilaration of each collision.

name: Room 14
description: You are inside an endless Highschool but there is a way you can escape. Search in the hallways of the school and find the changes within them to reach Room 14.

name: Cats
description: Cats — and that says it all. Interactive cat clicker. Click on cats for new cats. That's all, really.

name: Skizz
description: In Skizz, ski down the mountain, explore legends, and enhance your skills. There are no set objectives, just fun and discoveries. Descend, level up, and unravel mysteries at every turn.

name: ExMortalis
description: Awaken in a Victorian tower, face biotech horrors. ExMORTALIS: a stealth horror FPS, inspired by System Shock and Prey. Explore, survive, fight, hide. Choose implants for power or outmaneuver foes. Uncover the truth behind Necrotechs' experiments.

name: HD
description: Hongdu is a real dream that the developer happen in school when he was a young, because a dream developed this micro-puzzle game many years later. Independent pixel puzzle click game, the game is developed in Unity

name: Iridescent
description: Take to the skies in this vibrant eldritch roguelike as you blast away foes as a moth! Fell colossal creatures, collect items, and trade with cats in this colorful explosion of a game.

name: A Twisted Place
description: A Twisted Place is an unconventional Single-Player Horror game with multiple chapters. Wander through a disturbing & mysterious place while hiding from entities and find a way out. Interract with the environment to find tools, information and secrets.

name: Wizkid
description: Dodge deadly blades and leap over terrifying pitfalls to unearth reality-bending artifacts and spells as the Wizkid! Explore an enormous castle and delve into its labyrinthine dungeons in this side-scrolling platformer adventure where you must ultimately face an enemy beyond imagination.

name: Monster Quest
description: You are a powerful wizard, hurl elemental spells at your foes and try to get the highest score you can!

name: Liminal Void
description: This is a survival horror dungeon crawler in which you snatch souls, cast spells, and die repeatedly. Through death, you reach Liminal Layer 444: the lair of the Void Gods. Humanity requires them to be erased from existence to prevent another apocalypse.

name: Three Bulky Bears
description: The evil circular witch Rolldilocks has kicked the three bears out of their home! Time to get back and kick her out! In this 2D platformer, switch between Baby Bear, Mama Bear, and Papa Bear to navigate a variety of obstacles, as you roll, jump, swim, and smash your way through 2 challenging worlds!

name: D-Hospital
description: Survival Escape ARPG Control the protagonists as they explore a dangerous hospital overrun with mutants, find other survivors, and search for an escape route.

name: Margin of the Strange
description: Margin of the Strange is a gardening-themed mystery-exploration game about the world of human dreams from the developers behind OneShot. Over the course of 6 weeks, Ling seeks to find out more about this world in order to unravel the mysteries surrounding his own life... and his own death.

name: Eyes of Destiny
description: Take on the role of a man who has found himself in a terrible situation in life. Collect items, explore places, solve puzzles, overcome to the goal while hiding from the evil monsters that are chasing you! Find out what's really going on.

name: Mental Math Madness
description: An educational casual game designed to improve mental math skills. Before you are hordes of math equations that require rapid solving and shooting, all while dodging incoming projectiles. Gather gold to upgrade your lives and take on increasingly challenging levels and topics.

name: Utopia Must Fall
description: Defend humanity's last metropolis from mysterious alien machinations in this base-defending arcade shooter. Featuring rapid progression, randomly generated attack patterns and laser-sharp retro aesthetics.

name: Up Down All-a-Round
description: Control your player's gravity up and down and all a round! Master your gravity manipulating abilites to outwit your opponents and win the game!

name: The Secret Weapon
description: Get ready for endless laughs with The Secret Weapon - a wacky online card game that guarantees non-stop hilarity! Challenge friends, create insane combinations, and become the champion of absurdity!

name: Flame Protector: Sliding Kill
description: Keeping the flame burning is your only purpose. Flame Protector is a casual survival game where you protect the flames from an ever-increasing number of enemies until they reach the end of the flames.

name: Guard the Tower!
description: A tower defense game filled with 15 varied levels across 7 biomes and 14 unique monsters with 3 increasingly harder difficulties to challenge even the most experienced of tower defense gamers lurking in their strongholds.

name: Silenus
description: Uncover the secrets of an oil refinery operated by an obscure organization in this short, atmospheric narrative adventure.

name: Count to Ten
description: In this arcade-style game, chasing higher scores becomes an addictively fast-paced quest for precision. Count to Ten challenges you to tap numbered shapes in sequence, ramping up the challenge with every success. Pure, quickfire fun!

name: Knights of the Round Peg
description: Journey through Knights of the Round Peg's magical world with a brave lute-playing knight as you overcome peg obstacles!

name: Friendship Island
description: Escape from friendship island plagued by aliens. Classic FPS

name: Soul of Savarog
description: Soul of Savarog includes four of Twisted Universe's mobile horror thriller games. All of these plays tell the story of Savarog. Play Savarog, Savarog 2, Rule and Savarog 3 respectively.

name: Necromancer's Revenge
description: Become a necromancer betrayed by the Demon King. In this game combining survival, roguelite, and tower defense elements, defeat monsters, collect souls, and place totems. Summon the Demon King for revenge!

name: Lost Light: Bright mates
description: "The object, becoming a light that dispels darkness, will shine as a hope to illuminate the world." Yes, that's a light bulb. A hard action adventure game where a brave light bulb overcomes shadows with its gleaming and daring rolls, aiming for an electric lamp.

name: Flavors of Fortune
description: Flavors of Fortune is a casual pixel art arcade game about cooking and time management. Quickly cook and serve customers' orders to fulfill the day's profit quota and progress through a heartwarming story about taking over an owner's legacy.

name: Geras
description: "Geras" is a psychological horror game that explores themes of aging, mortality, and the fear of the unknown, with its haunting atmosphere and storytelling, But beware - in the world of "Geras" not everything is as it seems, and the line between reality and nightmare blurs with each passing moment.

name: Logix: The Missing Part
description: A First Person Puzzle Game in which you fix the Logic behind the Puzzle, and then solve the Puzzle to verify what you fixed.

name: Feet Paradise
description: What is a paradise for the feet? It's when your feet are tender and gentle, when your feet are kissed and just admired. This is exactly Feet Paradise!

name: Sakura Isekai Adventure 2
description: The second part of the Sakura Isekai Adventure series. A yuri fantasy story about Aki, a young woman on a journey to rescue a kidnapped priestess alongside her companions, who might be more than just fellow party members.

name: Buzz is a VTuber: I want to be famous, even if it's just a game
description: Attention: Currently only available in JapaneseThe First Vertically Streamer-Recommended Game? You, Enlarged by OBS, Are the Protagonist!In the fictional social media platform "Vitter," you aim to go viral as a VTuber in this game.Not just stream-friendly, but stream-recommended.

name: Knight Runner: Blade and Bolt
description: Fight your way through an endless forest, slaying monsters, dodging traps, and chasing the highest score possible in this simple yet addictive pixel art runner.

name: Jelly-Jelly
description:
Jelly-Jelly tells the epic tale of a jellyfish trying to find its place in the world.

Swim around the claymation environment, collecting starfish and avoiding the angry sea urchins (those guys are real spiky jerks!)

name: Barraka
description: Barraka is a claymation adventure game full of puzzles and surprises. Join our brave heroine as she explores the spooky fair in the small town. Along the way, she will encounter weird and wonderful characters and challenges. You will also have fun with bumper cars, whack-a-mole, the haunted house, a mini circus and more! Barraka is a game that will delight your senses and imagination.

name: Ojo Por Ojo
description:
Ojo Por Ojo was created for Spain Game Devs Jam II and it won the third place in art category thanks to the unique clamation aesthetic.

This is a crazy pass and play race game where you must collect five body parts to win.

name: Blood Beat Club
description:
Welcome to "Blood Beat Club"! Step into the shoes of Clayd, the ultimate vampire slayer, as he ventures into the heart of the night.

Navigate through neon-lit dance floors, each pulsating with energy and danger, as you match your moves to the rhythm of the music.

name: Ribbit Channel
description: Ribbit Channel is a short interactive cartoon. Graphics is done entirely in claymation, and the game itself is filled with color and warmth. The bright plasticine world could motivate anyone to sculpt from modelling clay, and perhaps remind you of your childhood. Ribbit Channel will make you happier and cheer you up on a rainy day.

name: Eat Me!
description: Eat Me! is a point and Click Adventure game where the props were shot using Claymation techniques. You are a parasite controlling small creatures to get eaten by the larger creature to gain power. You must solve environmental puzzles to get noticed and eaten by the larger creature and then hack their brains to gain control.

name: When Pigs Can Fly: Enter The Aporkalypse
description: In this apocalyptic SHMUP game, pigs are taking over the earth thanks to a zombie virus plaguing the worlds pig population. You are the hero of humanity and with the use of your biomechanical suit you can turn anything into a weapon.

name: Reclaym the Kingdom
description:
This game was developed in 7 very long days for the Epic MegaJam 2021 by Work Hard, Clay Hard. They are: Daniel Asperen (Level Design), Morris Belfrage (Animation), Josh Dutton (Audio), Luke Parkes-Haskell (Design), and Oskar Selin (Art).

The Kingdom of Plato once held aloft in the sky, falls into ruin. It has been abandoned by the High-Kings of old, leaving the denizens trapped as it slowly decays and crumbles into the abyss. They are quite literally running out of space - and it's only going to get worse.

Enter our erstwhile adventurer, Cassius who seeks to claim the throne, ergo the Kingdom for himself - and will stop at nothing to get it.

Navigate and fight your way through a world full of devious enemies, and defeat them by picking up floor tiles and using them as deadly projectiles - but you need to take great care, as each time you remove a floor tile, you give yourself one less to stand on, and you too may find yourself running out of space.

name: Palpable
description: Using photogrammetry we have converted every single frame of a claymation into an animated stop motion game character. Exploring the possibilities of maintaining the tactile and morphable qualities of clay togheter with the felxibility of an interactive 3D space.

name: The Rise of the Dough
description:
Once upon a time in a culinary land, a passionate Chef Heiny aspired to craft the finest bread imaginable.

Despite earnest attempts, his initial endeavors proved fruitless, leading him to discard the dough in frustration.

However, the following day brought an unexpected turn of events, and everything took a chaotic twist when Doug Heiny was born.

You must stop Doug H. from spreading across the world!

name: Dream Frontier
description:
Basil, Lavender, and Poppy are psychic friends on a quest to heal the divide between the normal world and the Dream Frontier. In this early adventure they travel to a small mountain village, meet strange characters, and solve the mystery of the Light from Prism Peak.

Dream Frontier is a turn-based role playing game inspired by Earthbound and 90’s SquareSoft RPGs. Players control a party of three characters, explore a colorful overworld, talk with characters in directed cutscenes, and engage with enemies in a simple combat system.
Encounters!

Encounter gameplay sticks to the basics of the genre with a few twists. Health is a “rolling counter” that doesn’t change instantly, giving the player time to act during a turn before it is drained. Each character has their own specialization and abilities that encourage varied play styles along with a unique Encore. The Encore system lets the characters build energy over an encounter and unleash a large psychic power.

name: Wizard of the 4 Corners
description:
Interpret a strange book of spells so you can transform into different animals and collect stars from the four corners of the world.

Created for Stop Motion Jam 2019 on the theme Shapeshifting. The game was created by H.H.Magoo in Delphi (RADstudio). The music was composed by Brother Kies using MuseScore3.

name: Rocktopus
description: Dive into a beautiful ocean of stop motion sea creatures and use eight of your fingers to control the eight legs of a xylophonic octopus. 'Rocktopus' is a music game with no rhythm required that works with QWERTY, AZERTY, and Dvorak keyboards. It was made for Stop Motion Jam 2020 with RAD studio, play dough, googly eyes, Fruit Loops, feathers, and artificial bacon bits. The jellyfish are real jelly!

name: Clay-Scape
description: Beware, would-be-escaper, This colorful clay might be hiding something sinister underneath!

name: Interplayer
description: Pick up the tokens, write the source code, and repair the data that your doctor has deleted! Write source code that achieves the input and expected output pairs set for each stage. The code is written in tolerance, a dedicated language.

name: A Kiss Of Salt Water
description: Inclusive erotic environment.

name: Silencio
description:
Everything you see is hand-modeled in clay and animated frame by frame using the stop motion technique.

It is an experience of less than a minute that took several days to complete.

Achieve silence.🫀

name: Growth Spurt: A Meandering Intermission into the Afterhours of a Miscalculation
description: A faux pas at the Middle School dance reverts Nour back to their primordial state and sends them on a one-night maximalist transformative journey. Flop, slide, leap, and rocket around the city filled with zany future friends and mysterious architectures. Play eclectic mini-games where you will discover whether surgery can be joyful, if aliens have feelings, and how to deal with a bad boss.

name: Complex X
description: Complex X is a platform arcade game, released by P.G.D. (Progressive Game Distributors) in April 1985; it was the last game to run on the altered version of Taito's Qix hardware first used for Space Dungeon, The Electric Yo-Yo, Kram, and Zoo Keeper (two Motorola M6809s run at 1.25 MHz and a Motorola M6802 run at 921.6 KHz, with an added Motorola M68705 run at 1 MHz). The game was originally going to be released by Taito America, but the company never released it because they closed down their manufacturing plant in September 1984. However, the game still credits Taito America and has a 1984 copyright date on the title screen. The player must use two eight-way joysticks (one for moving and one for firing) to take control of a nuclear scientist whose objective is to escape from a flooding reactor as the water's level rises below him before running out of air (which is indicated by the "AIR LEFT" meter at the top of the screen) - and every blue-and-magenta square he collects shall add ten shots to his reserve (indicated by the number above the "AIR LEFT" meter that starts at 50 for every level), which he must use to shoot creatures that block his progress. Like Mario and Luigi in Mario Bros., the scientist may also disappear off one side of the screen and reappear on the other, but to make him jump, the player needs to push a button on top of the "firing" joystick (and good timing is essential for reaching the moving, magenta platforms); furthermore, once the scientist reaches the level's exit, he will receive a bonus of 100 points for every shot remaining in his reserve.

name: Downward: Enhanced Edition
description: Enjoy the best version of Downward, with improved graphics and new assets... Live or relive a unique experience, as this new version adds new alternative endings.

name: Global Farmer
description: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map! Want to experience a rich strawberry harvest in the French countryside? Or challenge the hot sun in South America? The choice is yours!

name: Detective Lin: Time Murder Frenzy
description: A narrative click and point game where you gather information from the past to solve the murder of your best friend.

name: Many Crimes of Serenity Falls
description:
You are Ashley Rose, a brilliant detective about to enjoy her long overdue vacation in a remote mountainous village: Serenity Falls.

Of course, your getaway gets interrupted. Of course, there was a murder.

A child is found dead, circumstances are mysterious, and every damn person in this town has something to hide

Look for clues, interrogate townsfolk, and deduce conclusions in this retro-style detective mystery puzzle!

name: No Loose Threads
description: A detective game about the complications of working for a LOT of legal entities.

name: Vampire! At the Masquerade
description: You are Mircalla Karnstein, a ███ year old sapphic vampire on the hunt for the feminine comforts of your next dream girl/juice box. With the help of your vampiric servants, you go undercover to infiltrate a masquerade to look hot, overhear gossip, and use your brains to sweet talk a special lady into finding somewhere more private to have a “conversation”…

name: The Lonely Logs of Lincoln Lane
description: Pore through blueprints and datalogs to solve a series of murders without leaving your apartment. A game of logical deduction and critical thinking. Not all is as it seems...

name: Bus Stop
description: A pocket-sized intro to a whodunnit involving you, your phone, and the people at the bus stop you sleep at.

name: thread and Needle
description: A mixed up conversation between a mixed up spy and his informant.

name: Vincent's Chocolate
description: Emily travels to the family home to attend a birthday party. However, an unexpected event will trigger a series of events that will make him question whether his family is hiding any secrets.

name: Withering Gardens
description: Follow the aged-up detective in the dystopian future, trying to regain his memories back.

name: Kingdom Hearts
description:
Kingdom Hearts brings back the gameplay elements featured in the original Kingdom Hearts, though it was developed exclusively for V Cast, Verizon Wireless's broadband services. Sora moves similar to a tank, with one button on the control pad moving him forward, another moving him backwards, and two more turning him left or right. Even with these new controls, Sora can still perform a number of moves aside from running and jumping. He can climb trees and ladders, grasp the edges of platforms and pull himself up, lift and throw objects, and use the Keyblade to slide down zip lines.

Sora can still use the Keyblade and also magic, the first spell he learns being Blizzard, to fight like in Kingdom Hearts. Munny and Experience are still earned by defeating Heartless. As opposed to Kingdom Hearts, however, Kingdom Hearts introduced "assistant characters," such as the Caterpillar and Swordman Parrot, as opposed to guest party members.

name: Punch Club 2: Iron Fist
description: Build the robot champion and unravel the secrets of a mysterious AI in the new DLC for Punch Club 2: Fast Forward!

name: Doctor Who: Don't Blink
description: Can your webcam save you from the Weeping Angels in this spooky mini-game? The Angels can only get you when you’re not looking at them so 'don’t blink' and hold on until the Doctor sends the TARDIS for you. Too difficult? Too easy? Don't forget to rate and share.

name: Pokémon Emerald Cross
description:
Pokémon Emerald Cross is a ROM Hack of Pokémon Emerald designed to bring a massive array of quality of life features to the original game.

"Play Pokémon Emerald the way you remember it instead of how old Pokémon games actually were!"

Includes many new in-game modes that affect gameplay, quality-of-life additions, and tons of customization options so you can have an experience as close to or as far from vanilla as you want.

Emerald Cross fixes a lot of bugs from Pokémon Emerald, including:

Broken RNG
Battle facility bugs
Map errors, a lot of them!

name: Doctor Who: Say What You See
description:
Celebrate Doctor Who’s 50th Anniversary with Doctor Who: Say What You See!

We all know that the only thing cooler than bow ties are Doctor Who cryptic picture puzzles, and we’ve created over 150 of them for our brand new game!

Companions, gadgets, episode titles and monsters – all of these are hidden in our cunning paintings. Are you a big enough Doctor Who fan to solve them all?

Doctor Who: Say What You See features three paintings with 50 Catchphrase-style cryptic puzzles on each –

TARDIS Interior – Travel into the depths of the TARDIS, and discover the secrets within…

Totter’s Lane – Go to the mysterious alleyway where it all began 50 years ago, when a strange old man and his granddaughter first appeared on Earth…

Gallifrey (Coming Christmas 13) – Take a trip to the home planet of the Time Lords, and discover its secrets…

Suitable for Doctor Who fans young and old, these puzzles cover the entire 50 year span of the show, and every correct answer is rewarded with a factfile revealing secrets and trivia about your favourite characters, gadgets and monsters.

And if you get stuck, you can always use the ‘Stuck’ button to discover a few answers to get you started, or wave your Sonic Screwdriver to reveal the hidden hint coins on each painting.

So what are you waiting for? It’s time to save the universe from a puzzling fate, and only YOU can do it! Alons-y!

name: ONF: Tatakau Rasetsu he
description:
Parody of the visual novel ONE ~Kagayaku Kisetsu e~
Mizuka and Akane routes are retold with health bar concept, parody and numerous immediate death situations.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Ultimate Match-up
description: The game is a memory game during which you have to click on the gird to reveal DWMI Ultimate cards. All cards have to be matched-up with the card pairs as fast as possible to get a good high score.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Dalek Supremacy
description: The Daleks have to exterminate their enemies, the Silurians, the Sontarans and the Cybermen.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Vortex Run
description: Amy Pond and the Eleventh Doctor are on a spaceship on Kaydon 36 when the Time Vortex rips through space. The Eleventh Doctor reaches the TARDIS in time, but Amy is left on the ship and has to run for her life. The Doctor needs to teleport Amy safely back into the TARDIS.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - The Keys of Time
description: A Graske has stolen a key to the TARDIS. He's had it copied and scattered the copied keys around the universe. The Eleventh Doctor's mission is it to track down all keys before his enemies use them to steal the TARDIS.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Maze of the Dead
description: The Eleventh Doctor has reached the Maze of the Dead. He has to race through the chambers, dodge the Weeping Angels and scan the boxes to reach the Byzantium space ship. Furthermore the batteries of his torch run out after some time, he needs to scan the boxes for spares. If it's completely dark the Weeping Angels attack.

name: Doctor Who: Jobsworth Judoon
description:
The Tenth Doctor must return to his TARDIS which the Judoons have locked due to illegal parking.

He has to break the security codes around the forcefield holding the TARDIS and escape.

name: Doomed Love
description: Doomed Love is a hilarious simulation video game wherein you can romance the grotesque monsters from the hit first-person shooter, Doom.

name: Factory Outlet Simulator
description: Factory Outlet Simulator is a very comprehensive clothes manufacturing and selling game. You can produce the products of world famous brands in your factory and sell them. Or you can expand your business and create your own brand. Use your business acumen to lead the market from zero to the top!

name: Is it OK to pick up Anomalies at a University?
description: Sin descripción

name: Gladiate!
description:
A Spectacle Fighter Card Game.

Play with 6 unique decks and fight your way through a gauntlet of foes. Not only do you need to fight to survive, but also pull off combos to maximize your spectacle points and please the crowd. Can you make it to the final boss and emerge victorious?

name: Please Leave Me Alone
description: This is an anti-dating game. The goal is to make the characters hate you. If you click on the heart in the corner it will tell you how you're doing.

name: Romance Choice
description: Romance Choice is a short and strange, 4th wall breaking dating simulator with a surprising amount of emotion and some very clever twists.

name: SYNC: Since You Never Came
description: You have lost the love of your life. Overwhelmed by grief, you sit by her tomb, flipping through the pages of the journal that chronicles your life together.

name: Vizul
description: Mirtilo is a very troubled guy. One morning, they left home nearly without a trace, looking for their missing parents. Coincidentally, Mirtilo's cousin, Garoa, would pay her beloved relatives a visit moments later! Nobody was home, though. Come along this whimsical, colorful adventure with the two cousins seeking answers at each's own pace.

name: Devil's Food
description: Hey there! Welcome to Devil's Food! Hang out with two awesome pastel goths and see if you can survive the day. Will you crack them up, get under their skin, or maybe something else will happen? Give it your all and let's have some fun!

name: Calorie-kun vs. Moguranian
description:
Calorie-kun vs. Moguranian is a 1986 arcade game by Graphic Techno EW (a partnership between VIC Tokai and Seibu Lease) and released by Sega in Japan.

You play as an egg-shaped being (presumably Calorie-kun) who must navigate through a maze, eating everything on screen. The first button causes the character to attack by blowing or spitting(?) something out of its mouth; this can be used to knock enemies back, set of bombs, destroy enemies by knocking them into bombs, etc. The only mode of vertical movement is with ladders. You can also drop bombs with the second button; exactly when is unknown.

A similarly designed mole creature would later appear as the boss of Level 5 in Decap Attack.

name: Project Kinesis
description: Project Kinesis is a video game that blends card game combat, dice rolling, and collectable elements. Start by selecting your initial faction, then advance through each story chapter, collecting powerful cards to enhance your abilities.

name: PROG
description:
PROG, short for 'puzzle rooms of Gabriel', is a calm adventure game. It's a change from the fast-paced shoorters Soundwave produced before.

Point and click your way through puzzles, find Items and open the doors of this cardboard world.

name: Xenosphere
description: Drift, spin, dash, and golf your way in a journey through interstellar glyph space.

name: Woyo!!
description:
A french retro styled RPG inspired by Earthbound and Conker's bad fur day.

Play as Sam, freshly arrived in Montreuil City (in Paris's outskirts) from his native countryside, who finds himself embroiled in a series of incredible adventures.
Set off to discover this mysterious world, where you'll meet colorful characters who'll help you get to grips with local customs.
Learn to harness the power of the Shtrak to face down the dangerous enemies that stand in your way (pigeons, bandits, stroller moms and other hoodlums) and maraud them like a true narvalo de la Croix de Chavaux ! Will you be able to get out of trouble, or will you find yourself in the middle of it all ?
Your fate is in your own hands!

name: Last Man Standing Coop: A Doom 3 Coop Mod
description: Last Man Standing is a Doom 3 Coop Mod that aims to bring back the feel of the classic Dooms. Our LMS Mod gametype is survival in nature where you face swarms of attacking monsters to the adrenaline pumping energy of heavy metal soundtracks. We also fully support Doom 3 coop in the Single Player levels through the SP Coop gametype and the Doom 3 expansion pack ROE through the gametype ROE Coop. Also the Classic Doom for Doom 3 Mod has been integrated into LMS 4.0 to provide cooperative support! The monsters keep coming, and the bullets keep flying. Let the terror begin...

name: As You Wish
description: A short Visual Novel made for O2A2Q with washitape! Time to ask a goddess for dating advice!!

name: Good Idea!
description: Made for the Jame Gam #28. A sorta prequel to Good Job!

name: Hell-o
description: A short story about two sisters reporting to you everything new in the underworld!!

name: Wilderless
description: Wilderless is a walking/hiking/photography simulator set in a fantasy wilderness. Players can explore a beautiful, procedurally generated natural open world. Tons of options allow you to configure many aspects of the world, and you can choose your initial world seed to generate different worlds.

name: Tobia's Animal Farm
description: Coming home late at night, the last thing Hel expected was to see her daughter waiting for her - She wants to read a bedtime story together!

name: Spooky Shopping Tour!
description: Spooky Shopping Tour is a visual novel, where the end goal is to customize your shop! Get to know the characters and try appealing to their tastes in order to obtain their ending!

name: Zag
description: Zag is a short visual novel made for the Nanoreno 2024! It's about Teddy, a new (half-demonic) student who's supposed to get a school tour. Instead, he somehow ended up at the newspaper club - reading through newspaper clippings with the other members.

name: Heartburn
description: Go on a date with your favorite streamer Serze and take a look at the lovely cafe you're at!

name: Das Teufelswad
description:
Das Teufelswad is a 3 map pk3 with a hub level. You can play the levels in any order, but the chronological order they were made in is
1. Die Teufelsmaschine (originally released in RAMP2021)
2. Die Teufelsbrücke (originally released in RAMP2022)
3. Der Teufelsturm (Brand new - fresh out of the oven)

name: Polish Community Project
description: A bunch of Polish guys made a bunch of maps and put them together to celebrate Doom,

name: Liminal Doom 2
description: Liminal Doom 2: Crossing The Threshold is a set of seven MBF21 maps that are themed around the liminal space aesthetic. With a more elaborated and ambitious scope compared to its prequel, these maps hopefully will offer a different and unique experience. Each map has a different kind of atmosphere and purpose, and high attention was put into balancing the high energy gameplay moments with the quiet ones. Combat varies a lot in terms of encounters and enemy placement, and progression its mostly non linear with an emphasis on exploration and resource starvation if you are playing on UV.

name: Neon Nexus
description: Little techbase map with lots of neon!
